name: Before & After School Program
description: Before School: Partnered with the Mission YMCA to provide the morning program that runs from 7:30 am to 9:30 am After School: Program is offered by Mission YMCA - Cost-based program. Program is open during Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday from 3:45-6:45pm and Wednesday from 2:30-6:45pm.
